sqlquery.name: SQL_WaitDealDateUpdate
sqlquery.select:
select rs.titles as titles,rs.ids as ids from (select adi.title as titles,adi.id as ids,adi.dead_line_time as ltime from App_Dt_Issue adi where 1 = 1 and (adi.update_Status = '1' or adi.update_Status = '2' or adi.update_Status = '5' or adi.update_Status = '7') and #currenttimes#<adi.dead_line_time #con_peoples# union all
select adi.title as titles,adi.id as ids,adi.dead_line_time as ltime from App_Dt_Issue adi where 1 = 1 and (adi.update_Status = '3') and adi.audit_Id = '#con_user#'
union all
select adi.title as titles,adi.id as ids,adi.dead_line_time as ltime from App_Dt_Issue adi where 1 = 1 and (adi.update_Status = '4') and adi.review_Id = '#con_user#') rs order by rs.ltime desc
